item.description:
A translation follows.

The Field e ottimo perche e fuori all'aria aperta pero, se c'e la previsione di pioggia andremo al Phoenix Landing che offre un sconto generosa di 50% sui apperitivi pero bisogna esserci @ 18:45 e non piu tardi per ottenere il sconto.
Translation,

The Field is ideal because it is outdoors & not too loud but, in case of rain forecast, we'll go to the Phoenix Landing nearby which has a Happy Hour special valid until 7 PM so you have to get there before 7 if you want the special.

Please look for speakers at your level. The whole point of this setup @ these locations is we can freely alternate seating to suit.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: Parliamo l'italiano @ The Field
